level.heading: CREDIT(S)
level.text: (May 13, 1977, D.C. Law 1-134, title II, § 201, 24 DCR 406; Apr. 9, 1997, D.C. Law 11-212, § 402, 43 DCR 4962, effective upon the first meeting of the Board under § 32-262.4.)

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: See notes to § 44-1901.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-212, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 44-1901.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: D.C. Law 11-212, title IV, § 402 (43 DCR 4962), eff. April 9, 1997, provides:
"The D.C. General Hospital Commission Act, effective May 13, 1977 (D.C. Law 1- 134; D.C. Code § 32-201 et seq. [1981 Ed.] ), is repealed."
Title V, § 501(c) of D.C. Law 11-212, provides:
"(c) Section 402 shall become effective upon the first meeting of the Board pursuant to section 204(h)."
DC CODE § 44-1911
